body: I would prefer this to be const as well, since it is good documentation/forcing function that the configuration of a process group is immutable. The MPI initialization/destruction can be moved to some static function that returns e.g. a std::tuple with rank and size and then add a ProcessGroup constructor that takes a std::tuple for these variables.
